articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.title: Binance Quietly Launches Its Crypto-based PayPal Rival - Decrypt
articles.description: The crypto exchange has big hopes for Binance Pay, which is currently in beta.
articles.content:
In brief
  • Binance exchange has launched Binance Pay.
  • Users can use their crypto wallets to make purchases.
  • Vendors can convert from the Binance stablecoin to the euro.

articles.author: Mitchell Clark
articles.title: A Cyberpunk 2077 security exploit makes installing mods risky business - The Verge
articles.description: CD Projekt Red is warning Cyberpunk 2077 players not to install mods or custom saves, as a security vulnerability could allow malicious code to be run. The issue is one in a long line of bugs that have plagued the game since launch.
articles.content: Custom saves should also be avoided until a patch
